Activity: Log in to the hospital system, check emails. Review the to-do list for the day.
Compile a report on the week's activities, including the data quality checks, validation rules implementation, and audit findings.
Break. Browse the latest articles on EHR system improvements.
Review the report with @qatest-2 and make any necessary adjustments.
Present the week's report to @itpm-1, @clinlead-1, and @ehrv-1 in a meeting.
Address any feedback or questions from the meeting and update the report accordingly.
Send the final report to all relevant stakeholders.
Reflect on the week's work and identify areas for improvement.
Wrap up the week's work and plan for the next week.
